articles.author: RONALD BLUM
articles.title: Messi's 109th goal leads defending champion Argentina over Canada 2-0 and into Copa America final - The Associated Press
articles.description: Lionel Messi scored his 109th international goal and first of the tournament, leading defending champion Argentina over Canada 2-0 and into the Copa America final. Julián Álvarez put the Albiceleste ahead in the 22nd minute and Messi redirected Enzo Fernández…
articles.content:
EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. (AP) Lionel Messi and Argentina moved within one win of joining Spain as the only nations to win three straight major titles.
Its insane what this team has done, what the Argen… [+4360 chars]
